team.name: Takefusa Kubo
description: El lider de los Azon, tuvo que hacerse cargo del Imperio desde muy jovén lo cual le ha hecho una de las personas más resistentes del mundo
The leader of the Azon, being forced to take care of the Empire from a young age has turned him into one of the most resilient people in the world

abilities.name: BUFFSTATS V
description: Kubo inspira a un aliado con su coraje, ampliando su capacidad de combate
Kubo inspires an ally with his bravery, buffing his combat capability
